overview: Ted Ho has over 20 years experience leading large and small engineering teams for consistent on-time execution of complex, leading-edge technology projects. Prior to joining Gigamon, Ted was the Vice President of Engineering at Network Associates, where under his leadership the Distributed Sniffer product line was developed, launched and is now generating more than $170M worth of revenues annually. Ted is a result-driven senior executive with extensive experience in building engineering organization, methodology and process. Ted holds a Master of Computer Engineering from the University of Southern California and a B.S. from the National Cheng-Kung University in Taiwan.
